title: Culture: Invisible Force
description: Uncover the hidden power of culture! Explore how it shapes our lives in just 60 seconds. #anthropology #culture #education

frames.narration: Culture surrounds us, shaping our lives. But what exactly *is* culture?
frames.image_description: Opening shot: Fast-paced montage of diverse people globally in various cultural settings.

frames.narration: Culture is learned, not innate. We acquire it from family and society.
frames.image_description: Visual: Baby observing and interacting with family members in a cultural setting.

frames.narration: Culture is shared. Beliefs and practices unite groups of people.
frames.image_description: Visual: Group of people celebrating a cultural festival or event together.

frames.narration: Shared behaviors, like greetings, build cultural identity and connection.
frames.image_description: Visual: Split screen: Different cultures greeting each other (bowing, shaking hands).

frames.narration: Culture gives meaning to symbols, objects, and everyday actions.
frames.image_description: Visual: Montage of cultural symbols (flags, religious symbols, traffic signs) appearing.

frames.narration: Values are cultural ideas about what is good, right, and desirable.
frames.image_description: Visual: Abstract representation of values like family, respect, honesty, community.

frames.narration: Cultural norms are unwritten rules guiding behavior in society.
frames.image_description: Visual: People following social norms in different settings (queuing, table manners).

frames.narration: Norms vary greatly across cultures. What's normal differs!
frames.image_description: Visual: Contrasting images of norms in different cultures (dress codes, personal space).

frames.narration: Values and norms shape our perceptions and interactions daily.
frames.image_description: Visual: People interacting in everyday situations, influenced by norms and values.

frames.narration: Culture subtly influences choices: food, fashion, relationships, beliefs.
frames.image_description: Visual: Quick cuts of everyday choices influenced by culture (food, clothing, interactions).

frames.narration: Culture shapes our identity, sense of belonging, and worldview.
frames.image_description: Visual: Diverse individuals expressing their cultural identities proudly and confidently.

frames.narration: Culture: An invisible force, constantly shaping your life. Explore it!
frames.image_description: Visual: Globe with interconnected people from diverse cultures, smiling and interacting.
